name: The County Hotel
description:
GOOD NEWS YOU'RE HIRED!! For what? You are the hotel counter! Guests will be arriving and checking out of the hotel, can you keep track of them all?! What's the point of all this? The yacht... ITS ALL ABOUT THE YACHT!

The County Hotel is a chill game where you keep track of guests and upgrade your hotel. Your brain's accuracy will be tested as you count your way through ever growing crowds, natural disasters, and an impatient boss.  So sit back, relax, and start counting...

The County Hotel was developed by Daniel Rasmussen a UX product designer and game developer hobbyist.
